program: Master of Science in Civil and Environmental Engineering (MS)

sections.text: MIT CEE’s MS is a research‑focused degree preparing graduates for advanced practice and doctoral study in civil and environmental engineering.

items: At least 66 units of graduate subjects
Minimum 34 units from CEE departmental subjects
sections.text: Students complete departmental and elective graduate subjects and perform original research culminating in a thesis.
The degree requires approved coursework and an original thesis meeting departmental standards.
Graduates pursue engineering consulting, infrastructure and environmental practice, and PhD research.
